name: Isolation (itch) (KyeMcmillan)
description:
Isolation is about a young girl who has found herself trapped in this building which she doesn't recognize. The aim of the game is to escape the facility by dodging the evil things that lay around. 

How to play ?

W- Forward

A- Left

D- Right

C- Crouch

SHIFT- Walk

SPACE- Leap

E- Slow Time

System Requirements-

  • CPU: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • CPU SPEED: Info
  • RAM: 2 GB
  • VIDEO CARD: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • PIXEL SHADER: 2.0
  • VERTEX SHADER: 2.0
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 8 GB
  • DEDICATED VIDEO RAM: 128 MB
